idea-plugin.description:
This plugin streamlines the process of working with http4k projects by providing a user-friendly functionality within the IDE. It:
- generates boilerplate http4k based projects with ease by integrating a project wizard into IntelliJ IDEA. - generates http4k server, client and model code from OpenAPI spec. Right click on the file and select New -> http4k -> OpenAPI to http4k. - generates data classes from JSON/YAML files. Right click on the file and select New -> http4k -> Dataclasses.
